Element.name: ErrorPortDefinition
Element.Description:
An Error Port Definition is the exit point of an Action Definition that causes an Error Event to be thrown on the referencing Actions.

All parameters added to the definition are made available on the referencing Error Event and can be bound to external elements.

PropertyCategory.name: General
PropertyCategory.Property: If checked, the Error Port Definition is reached automatically from elements of the Action Definition whose execution fail but have no applicable outgoing Error Flows modeled.
If checked, the port definition is the default error port definition of the Action Definition.
The default output parameter dedicated to the error message.

PropertyCategory.name: Appearance
PropertyCategory.Property: A distinctive icon displayed in the diagram and in the outline.
If checked, all parts belonging to this port definition will be displayed.
